              Turjya Laskar

            Bio
            With a profound expertise in biostatistics and clinical
            research, Turjya Laskar specializes in delivering insightful
            analyses and innovative solutions across diverse areas
            including survival analysis, meta-analysis, and machine
            learning. Leveraging a strong background in public health,
            Turjya excels in applying statistical methods to unravel
            complex data, drive evidence-based decision-making, and
            contribute to advancements in medical research.
            Turjya’s proficiency extends across a range of
            statistical software and programming languages, ensuring a
            robust approach to data analysis and interpretation.
            Committed to enhancing research outcomes and improving
            public health strategies, Turjya brings a combination of
            analytical skills, domain knowledge, and a dedication to
            excellence in every project undertaken.
            Whether you’re seeking expertise in clinical trial
            analysis, survival data modeling, or integrating machine
            learning techniques into your research, Turjya Laskar offers
            a comprehensive and meticulous approach to meet your
            biostatistical needs.
            
            
            Education
            Institute of Medical Sciences, BHU |
            Varanasi, IN
            Msc in Bio statistics | December 2021 - December 2023
            Gurucharan College, Silchar | Assam,
            IN
            Bsc in Statistics | July 2017 - December 2021
            
            
            Experience
            AIIMS Gorakhpur | External Bio
            statistical Consultant | May 2024 - Present
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Turjya Laskar
